name: Orycota
description:
Curious Wanderers
The Orycotal are a culture of curious wanderers marked by suspicion and superstition. They have complex relationships with the Fey and value tranquility despite their curiosity.

options.name: Trained against Darkness
options.description: In response to taking Dark Damage, reduce the amount by double your Level. If all the Dark Damage was Mitigated, gain morale equal to your Level until the end of your next turn.

options.name: Suspicious Insight
options.description: Gain +1 Insight and you can detect illusions and shape-changing with a successful check.

options.name: Curious Explorer
options.description: Gain +1 Senses and you notice hidden doors and secret passages automatically when within 5 units.
